transcript.text: Thanks all right Shalom well hallelujah
I film my first podcast to rville number
17 at PSU and soon as i was done it drew
andy has been one of my hecklers and he
was actually very kind he bought me some
coffee we had a good one-on-one
conversation he says Yahshua has
delivered him from alcoholism and drugs
and he's been sober for a year so
hallelujah but then I incursion that he
needs to now replace that with the
commandments of Torah so that he doesn't
fall back into his lifestyle sin he says
he's getting married in a couple months
februari I said don't have sex outside
of marriage move up the marriage date if
you have to but don't it's better to get
married than to burn and then he kind of

hallelujah it was a good one-on-one
